content: this text is a legal document explaining the progress of a divorce case between mr md and mrs cr the parties have agreed to a mutual consent divorce and have made agreements regarding various aspects of their separation they have divided their tangible and intangible assets made arrangements for their children declared their debts and agreed on the payment of income taxes they have also made arrangements regarding rental property and real estate they have renounced inheritance rights and matrimonial benefits and any gifts or testamentary dispositions made during their marriage are revoked they have agreed to have a notarial deed drawn up to confirm these arrangements the settlement is binding on both parties and does not affect any creditors the text also mentions that the parents need to come up with a custody and residence arrangement for their children they confirm that they have enough income and agree not to pay maintenance to each other they also agree to split the costs and fees related to the divorce proceedings equally the text explains that the parties have reached a mutual consent and have entered into a contractual agreement they will file a joint petition for divorce and have made arrangements for the division of their rights the only exception is that mr md will compensate mrs cr with a specific amount of money the text also mentions the sale of a property and the deduction of compensation from the sale price the parties acknowledge their obligations and grant a power of attorney to the notary the notary confirms the fulfillment of a certain deed signed by the partners of a company
